languages.text: "Откликнуться на призыв. Явиться на эту встречу, взглянуть в лица тех, кто там собрался. И начать восстановление кабала. Опустошительная буря жива, пока жив я — и я заставлю весь Темный город содрогнуться, когда мы вернемся во всей силе".

traits.locale_text: "Собрать воинов. Дать отпор. Разбить врагов. И начать восстановление кабала. Опустошительная буря жива, пока жив я — и я заставлю весь Темный город содрогнуться, когда мы вернемся во всей силе".

languages.text: "Answer the summons. Attend the meeting, look at the faces of those who have gathered there. And start rebuilding the Kabal. The Reaving Tempest is not dead while I still breathe, and I will make the Dark City tremble when we return there in full force."
languages.original_text: "Откликнуться на призыв. Явиться на эту встречу, взглянуть в лица тех, кто там собрался. И начать восстановление кабала. Опустошительная буря жива, пока жив я — и я заставлю весь Темный город содрогнуться, когда мы вернемся во всей силе".

traits.locale_text: "Answer the summons. Attend the meeting, look at the faces of those who have gathered there. And start rebuilding the Kabal. The Reaving Tempest is not dead while I am breathing, and I will make the Dark City tremble when we return there in full force."

"Answer the summons. Attend the meeting, look at the faces of those who have gathered there. And start rebuilding the Kabal. The Reaving Tempest is not dead while I am breathing, and I will make the Dark City tremble when we return there in full force."

"Answer the summons. Attend the meeting, look at the faces of those who have gathered there. And start rebuilding the Kabal. The Reaving Tempest is not dead while I still breathe, and I will make the Dark City tremble when we return there in full force."

"Answer the summons. Attend the meeting, look at the faces of those who have gathered there. And start rebuilding the Kabal. The Reaving Tempest is not dead while I still breathe, and I will make the Dark City tremble when we return there in full force."

"Answer the summons. Attend the meeting, look at the faces of those who have gathered there. And start rebuilding the Kabal. The Reaving Tempest is not dead while I still breathe, and I will make the Dark City tremble when we return there in full force."

languages.text: "Folgt der Vorladung. Erscheint bei der Versammlung, seht den Leuten ins Gesicht, die gekommen sind. Und beginnt mit dem Wiederaufbau der Kabale. Der plündernde Sturm ist nicht tot, so lange ich noch atme, und ich werde die Dunkle Stadt erzittern lassen, wenn wir unsere volle Macht wiedererlangt haben."
languages.original_text: "Answer the summons. Attend the meeting, look at the faces of those who have gathered there. And start rebuilding the Kabal. The Reaving Tempest is not dead while I still breathe, and I will make the Dark City tremble when we return there in full force."

traits.locale_text: "Folgt der Vorladung. Erscheint bei der Versammlung, seht den Leuten ins Gesicht, die gekommen sind. Und beginnt mit dem Wiederaufbau der Kabale. Der plündernde Sturm ist nicht tot, so lange ich noch atme, und ich werde die Dunkle Stadt erzittern lassen, wenn wir unsere volle Macht wiedererlangt haben."

languages.text: “我打算回应召唤，出席会议，看看都有哪些人聚集在那里，之后着手重建阴谋团。只要我还活着，狂风阴谋团就不会消失。等我们重整旗鼓回到黑暗之城，我会让那座城市颤抖。”
languages.original_text: "Answer the summons. Attend the meeting, look at the faces of those who have gathered there. And start rebuilding the Kabal. The Reaving Tempest is not dead while I still breathe, and I will make the Dark City tremble when we return there in full force."

traits.locale_text: “我打算回应召唤，出席会议，看看都有哪些人聚集在那里，之后着手重建阴谋团。只要我还活着，狂风阴谋团就不会消失。等我们重整旗鼓回到黑暗之城，我会让那座城市颤抖。”

languages.text: « Je vais répondre à l'appel. Aller au rassemblement, regarder les rescapés en face. Et commencer à rebâtir la Kabale. Je maintiendrai la Tempête ravageuse en vie jusqu'à mon dernier souffle, et je ferai trembler la Cité Crépusculaire quand nous y retournerons en force. »
languages.original_text: "Answer the summons. Attend the meeting, look at the faces of those who have gathered there. And start rebuilding the Kabal. The Reaving Tempest is not dead while I still breathe, and I will make the Dark City tremble when we return there in full force."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais répondre à l'appel. Aller au rassemblement, regarder les rescapés en face. Et commencer à rebâtir la Kabale. Je maintiendrai la Tempête ravageuse en vie jusqu'à mon dernier souffle, et je ferai trembler la Cité Crépusculaire quand nous y retournerons en force. »

languages.text: «Responder a la convocatoria. Asistir a la reunión y mirar a la cara a los reunidos. Y empezar a reconstruir la Kábala. La Tempestad Asoladora no habrá muerto mientras yo respire. Y, cuando volvamos a nuestro apogeo, haré que la Ciudad Siniestra se estremezca».
languages.original_text: "Answer the summons. Attend the meeting, look at the faces of those who have gathered there. And start rebuilding the Kabal. The Reaving Tempest is not dead while I still breathe, and I will make the Dark City tremble when we return there in full force."

traits.locale_text: «Responder a la convocatoria. Asistir a la reunión y mirar a la cara a los reunidos. Y empezar a reconstruir la Kábala. La Tempestad Asoladora no habrá muerto mientras yo respire. Y, cuando volvamos a nuestro apogeo, haré que la Ciudad Siniestra se estremezca».

languages.text: 「召集に応じろ。会合に参加してそこに集まっている物たちの顔を見るんだ。そしてもう一度陰謀団を立て直せ。俺が息をしている間はリーヴィング・テンペストは滅びない。俺たちが全軍を引き連れて戻った時には仄暗き都は絶望に震えるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Answer the summons. Attend the meeting, look at the faces of those who have gathered there. And start rebuilding the Kabal. The Reaving Tempest is not dead while I still breathe, and I will make the Dark City tremble when we return there in full force."

traits.locale_text: 「召集に応じろ。会合に参加してそこに集まっている物たちの顔を見るんだ。そしてもう一度陰謀団を立て直せ。俺が息をしている間はリーヴィング・テンペストは滅びない。俺たちが全軍を引き連れて戻った時には仄暗き都は絶望に震えるだろう」

languages.text: "Çağrılarına yanıt vereceğim. Toplantıya katılacak ve oradakilerin yüzlerine iyice bir bakacağım. Ve Kabal'ı yeniden inşa etmeye başlayacağım. Ben hâlâ nefes aldığım sürece Müfteris Kasırga ölmedi demektir ve tüm gücümüzle geri döndüğümüzde Kara Şehir ayaklarımızın altında titreyecek."
languages.original_text: "Answer the summons. Attend the meeting, look at the faces of those who have gathered there. And start rebuilding the Kabal. The Reaving Tempest is not dead while I still breathe, and I will make the Dark City tremble when we return there in full force."

traits.locale_text: "Çağrılarına yanıt vereceğim. Toplantıya katılacak ve oradakilerin yüzlerine iyice bir bakacağım. Ve Kabal'ı yeniden inşa etmeye başlayacağım. Ben hâlâ nefes aldığım sürece Müfteris Kasırga ölmedi demektir ve tüm gücümüzle geri döndüğümüzde Kara Şehir ayaklarımızın altında titreyecek."
